full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Hope you’re having a wonderful day!

As requested, we will proceed with removing the pre-order tag for the following items:

  1. CZ90380 – COZZE PIZZA STARTER KIT
  2. CZ90537 – OUTDOOR KITCHEN 60CM
  3. CZ90536 – OUTDOOR KITCHEN 90CM
  4. CZ90310 – COZZE BBQ STARTER KIT
  5. CZ90535 – COZZE OUTDOOR KITCHEN 115 OPEN

If you have any further questions or need additional assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

action.text: Joy T assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Awesome news Bonnie!

Confirming we've removed the Pre-Order tag from those pages. You can find them here:

  1. https://cozze.com.au/product/premium-rotate-13-electric/
  2. https://cozze.com.au/product/premium-rotate-17-electric/
  3. https://cozze.com.au/product/premium-rotate-13/
  4. https://cozze.com.au/product/premium-rotate-17/
  5. https://cozze.com.au/product/outdoor-kitchen-60/

Please let us know if we can help with anything else. Have a great weekend ahead!

Hi team,

Good news! We have received stock of the below products in our warehouse:

CZ90882 13" electric oven

CZ90887 17" electric oven

CZ90872 13" gas oven

CZ90877 17" gas oven

CZ90537 Pizza Table 60

Can you please remove the "pre-order" messaging from these product pages. Customers can order and expect them to be dispatched early next week 😊

Thanks and enjoy your weekend!

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

Hi Bonnie,

We are happy to inform you that the “Dispatch available 1st October 2025” note is now visible in all three touchpoints for cozze.com.au:
  • Product page
  • Checkout
  • Order confirmation email

Kindly check and let us know if these are all good on your end.

Also, we have already set a reminder for our team to disable this on the 26th of September.

The “Dispatch available 1st October 2025” note is now visible in all three touchpoints:

  • Product page
  • Checkout
  • Order confirmation email

pls check @joy tysm!

@glen Kindly check the update here.
I'll set a calendar notification for us to remove "Dispatch available 1st October 2025" on the 26th of September.

Hi Bonnie,

We appreciate your quick confirmation.

These are noted. We can set up a reminder to turn off the messaging by the 26th of September.

We will let you know as soon as this is done.

Hi Joy,

Users should be able to checkout as normal and make payment to secure the order.

Can you please ensure that for these orders, the "Dispatch available 1st October 2025" is visible in the below 3 touchpoints:


  1. On the product page
  2. At checkout
  3. On the email order confirmation


Is it possible for this messaging to turn off on 26 September and accept orders as normal?

Thanks
Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

Hi Bonnie,

Just a quick check-in—we wanted to confirm what the pre-order option should do:

  1. Should users be asked to make a payment, or
  2. Should it simply collect their details via a form?

Looking forward to your guidance so we can proceed.
@glen - Let's work on this, please. Thanks!

Hi Bonnie,

Thank you for the heads up on the upcoming Cozze products.

The following requests are noted, and we will send you an update within this week:

  1. Action: Set the listed Cozze products (currently marked out of stock) to available for pre-order.
  2. Customer-facing note: “Available for dispatch from the 1st of October 2025”

Feel free to reach out if anything else comes up!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

The below Cozze products are new to Australia and will be landing in our warehouse on the 31st of September.

I marked them as out of stock this morning, but I would like them to be available for pre-order. Can you please set the below SKUs with this function, with the note "Available for dispatch from the 1st of October 2025"



Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
